Title: I'll Cry Instead
facts: The Beatles recorded this in two sections that were then edited together.
There is an extra verse on US album version.
Joe Cocker covered this. He had a #1 hit with his version of The Beatles "A Little Help From My Friends" 4 years later.

This was intended for the Beatles film A Hard Day's Night, but it was replaced by "Can't Buy Me Love."
